hero_slogan: I blend design and performance to bring ideas to life with React, Tailwind, and creativity.
about_paragraph_intro: Passionate Full-Stack Developer, specialized in the
about_paragraph_experience: elegant and intuitive interfaces that leave an impact.
skills_desc_frontend: I create smooth, intuitive, and accessible web and mobile interfaces, focusing on user experience and aesthetics.
skills_desc_backend: I develop server-side architecture, RESTful APIs, and manage databases (NoSQL/SQL) to ensure performance.
skills_desc_tools: Mastery of collaboration tools, version control (Git), and continuous deployment workflows for a professional process.
skills_desc_design: I design visual prototypes and closely collaborate with product/design teams to turn ideas into reality.
experience_intro: Tracing my path, from training to concrete achievements.

exp1.title: Front-End Developer & Integrator | La Rosette, Mananara
exp1.task1: Front-end development and integration for complete school management.
exp1.task2: Advanced modules: student management, tuition, grades, invoices (PDF conversion and printing).
exp1.task3: Employee management, dynamic dashboard with monthly profit/loss charts.
exp1.task4: Use of advanced filters and responsive design for all interfaces.

exp2.title: Front-End Developer | Magic Lavage, Mananara
exp2.task1: Created a web app for full management of a car wash center and staff.
exp2.task2: Order tracking, scheduling, and client/employee history.
exp2.task3: Frontend deployment on Netlify with Firebase for database and authentication.

exp3.title: Front-End Developer & Integrator | Itakalo Mobile App
exp3.task2: UX/UI optimization and performance tuning for different mobile resolutions.
exp3.task3: Mobile app for selling, exchanging, and donating items.

exp4.title: Full-Stack MERN & Electron Developer | Trifako (Waste Sorting Management)
exp4.task1: Full-stack development: backend with Express.js & MongoDB, frontend with Electron.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
exp4.task2: Created a dynamic dashboard with charts and advanced filters.
exp4.task3: Integrated a Madagascar map for zone tracking (OpenMap/Leaflet).
exp4.task4: Advanced search and weather API integration.

projectsSubtitle: Take a look at concrete proof of my skills.
Revenez à \"Tous\" pour voir l'ensemble: Go back to "All" to see all projects or explore my other skills.

AllProjects.description: Design and development of a **car wash and parking management application** allowing users to reserve spots by **start and end dates**, make **real-time bookings** based on entry and exit times, and manage the **car wash process** efficiently.
Development of an **interactive portfolio for a company** showcasing its services, products, and achievements, with a smooth interface and modern animations.

Design and development of an **intelligent medical management site** integrating an **AI-based diagnostic system**, appointment management, patient-doctor messaging, and a modern, responsive interface.
Second version of a portfolio focusing on clarity and project presentation, using dynamic and responsive cards and galleries.
Mini showcase project made with **HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap**, simulating an online food service with an **interactive add-to-cart modal** and a confirmation alert.
First iteration of a minimalist personal portfolio, clear presentation of skills and experiences, static site with media integration.
Interactive quiz application for learning and evaluating language skills, with real-time scoring and multiple difficulty levels.
Design and development of a **complete school ERP system** for centralized management of students, courses, teachers, and exams, featuring an interactive dashboard and modern interface.
Local mini e-commerce project for practicing **full CRUD**, including cart management, simulated purchase confirmation, and dynamic product filtering.
Time management tool for cybercafés allowing to **track each workstation usage**, automatically calculate the amount to pay, and display real-time notifications.
Cross-platform waste management software for plastic, organic, and metal waste, featuring an interactive dashboard, real-time statistics, and a dynamic map of Madagascar.
Modern and dynamic landing page for a service company, highlighting key offers with a clean design and visuals optimized for user engagement.
Interactive community platform allowing users to consult and discuss Malagasy laws, developed to experiment with a real-time environment.

Each academic year, I design a new version of my **portfolio** to reflect the evolution of my **skills**, **experience**, and **expertise**. This project represents my **constant growth**, with a particular focus on **UX/UI**, **smooth navigation**, and **high-quality design**.

This is my very first website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — a small project focused on the gaming sector, developed during my first university year (L1). It helped me strengthen my front-end foundations, improve my HTML/CSS skills, and explore my first dynamic interactions using JavaScript.
